title: Contact

expect.title: What to expect
expect.ctaLead: To match a path faster, review the Framework first and share your constraints clearly.

items.i1: Reply time: typically within 24–48 hours on weekdays.
items.i2: We respond by email first; WeChat is used when needed.
items.i3: No performance promises. The focus is process and risk constraints.
